```{r}
### Load library
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(XLConnect)
```

```{r}
### GET URLS
urls <- read_html("http://www.klassiekshop.nl/labels/labels-a-e/?limit=all")
```

```{r}
### EXTRACT URLS FROM PRODUCTS
urls <- urls %>% 
  html_nodes(".product-name a") %>% 
  html_attr("href") %>%
  as.character()

url <- as.data.frame(urls)
as.character(url$urls)
```

```{r}
### CREATE EMPTY DATAFRAME
EAN <- NULL
price <- NULL
aanbieding <- NULL
df <- data.frame(EAN, price, aanbieding)
```

```{r}
### GET DATA
for(i in urls){
  
site <-read_html(i)
print(i)
  data <- data.frame(EAN =site %>% html_node("b") %>% html_text() ,
               price =site %>% html_node(".price") %>% html_text() ,
               stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
 df <-rbind(df,data)
}
```
